#summary Try out pchart4mw

Once pchart4mw is installed you can try creating your first bar chart.

Open a page of your wiki site and edit this wikitext in it:
{{{
<pbars>
5345
3452
7843
</pbars>
}}}

After you have saved the page it should show a bar chart like:

http://pchart4mw.googlecode.com/files/pchart4mw-bar-00.png

|| Wikitext || Chart ||
|| {{{<pbars> 5345 3452 7843 </pbars>}}} ||http://pchart4mw.googlecode.com/files/pchart4mw-bar-00.png ||

|||||<tablestyle="width: 80%">'''Heading'''||
||cell 1||cell2||cell 3||
||<rowspan=2> spanning rows||||<style="background-color: #E0E0FF;"> spanning 2 columns||
||<rowstyle="background-color: #FFFFE0;">cell2||cell 3||
